Package ru.soloviev.domain.interfaces

Interface IAccount

All Known Implementing Classes:
CreditAccount, DebitAccount, DepositAccount
public interface IAccount
Interface for different types of account with getters for id and balance, with time skip function, updaters of time and rate, functions of add and reduce money

    • CheckFutureBalance

      BigDecimal CheckFutureBalance(Duration timeSpan) throws RateException
      Function of time skip
      Parameters:
      timeSpan - time that wanted to skip
      Returns:
      balance on account after skipped time
      Throws:
      RateException

      Updater of date
      Parameters:
      clock - virtual timer
      Throws:

      void ChangeRate(IRate newRate)
      Updater of rate
      Parameters:

    • AddMoney

      BigDecimal AddMoney(BigDecimal money) throws AccountException
      Add money to account
      Parameters:
      money - sum that we want to add, positive
      Returns:
      how much money was added (for transfer history)
      Throws:
      AccountException - if verified of operation was failed

    • ReduceMoney

      BigDecimal ReduceMoney(BigDecimal money, boolean verified, BigDecimal limit) throws BankException, AccountException
      Reduce money to account
      Parameters:
      money - sum that we want to subtract, positive
      verified - flag, if true - account has not limit
      limit - maximal sum that can be subtracted
      Returns:
      how much money was subtracted (for transfer history)
      Throws:
      BankException - if verified of operation was failed with bank information
      AccountException - if verified of operation was failed with balance information
